item.title: I'm an IoT Imp!
item.description: I got my electric imp and imp breakout board from SparkFun last week, and I decided to check it out today and see what I could do with it in an hour. I’m re-stocking my Internet of Things (IoT) bag of tricks, and this is the first device I’ve gotten in a while, so here’s how that went. Of course I have the requisite unpacking porn. Itâ€™s actually a pretty nice bit of kit, with a Cortex M3 stuffed into a SSD Memory Card form factor.
